channel.title: Path specified
channel.description:
i have error like "the system cannod find path specified" i know were i need to know like "my computer" "porpies" "advanced" "enivorement something like that" ten what i need to do ? please help...
what i need to do what i need to create i heatr i need to creat somethink like classpath and write in there something
okey there is a pic and what i need to write and what i need to do ? :)
[IMG]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/117/speficiasiy6.jpg[/img]

item.title: Path specified
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

The fix to your problem is that you need to goto environmental variables

Under System variables make a new variable with the name ‘PATH’ and the value will be ‘C:\Windows\System32’

and your done.

Read full topic

item.title: Path specified
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

there are tutorials but since im nice.

You have the write the path of where your JDK is located at something like

c:\program_files (x86)\ jdk

thats only an example but you should check your path and simply just copy and paste it

Read full topic
